title: UK Foundries?
content:
I’ve been searching for some UK type foundries but i can’t seem to find any decent ones. I’m sure many of you would know of some.. =)

 [‹ Looking for the best Serif font on earth](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126132336/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27736 "Go to previous forum topic") [Berlin Hauptbahnhof ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126132336/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21110 "Go to next forum topic")
author: makumaku
